body.p:
Ans. 7th
Columbia Kentucky
Novr 5. 1863
Govr Bramlette.

You know that I belong to the 13th Ky. Vol. Inft. the time of said Reg. will be out I believe the 2nd day of October next. I am anxious to go into the 12 months service for the defense of the state, and believe that I could raise a company for that purpose in a short time the object of this is to know whether I could be detached from the U. S. service, to go into the service indicated, and if so, whether I can obtain from you commission to recruit
Please give me at your earliest convenience the desired information.
Ans. that no more authority will be given for recruiting for twelve months service.

Columbia Ky
Novr 5th 1863.
Atkins Wm J.
Desires authority to recruit a company for some of the 12 month Regiments.
Answer. No more authority will be given to recruit for 12 month regiments.

Boyle
Recd A G. O 7th Novr 1863
